author: kolbyml
content:
I just thought I would share this so before I mentioned there were Portal implementations being built in `Rust`, `Nim`, and `TypeScript`.

But since a few months back a 4th Portal Client has hit the scene being written in `GoLang` called Shisui here is a blog post about it <https://blog.ethportal.net/posts/shisui-story> in terms of feature completeness Shisui is passing all of our History Network's 4444's interop tests so it should be usable when Portal History is available (it technically already is, but pre-merge history is not finished seeding yet), which should be very soon as all of the critical bugs in our Rust implementation have been fixed.
